Package sdljava.video

Provides all the functions which are defined in the SDL_video.h header.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BlitQueue  
GammaTable Holds gamma translation look table values.
SDLColor SDLColor describes a color in a format independent way.
SDLGrabMode  
SDLOverlay A SDL_Overlay is similar to a SDL_Surface except it stores a YUV overlay.
SDLPalette Color palette for 8-bit pixel formats
SDLPixelFormat Stores surface format information
SDLRect Describe class SDLRect here.
SDLSurface Graphical Surface Structure
SDLVideo Please see the SDL Documention project page here
SDLVideoInfo Video Target information
SDLVideoMode Class to represent a possible SDL Video Mode (not part of SDL)
 

Package sdljava.video Description

Provides all the functions which are defined in the SDL_video.h header.

Package Specification

Provides all the functions which are defined in the SDL_video.h header. Detailed documentation can be found here:
  • SDL API
